languages.text: {n}Мужчина с трудом сдерживается, чтобы не прыснуть со смеху.{/n} "Ой, прекрати! Конечно-конечно, раньше я был отбросом и пушечным мясом, но вот ТЕПЕРЬ я действительно нужен Империуму! Да даже будь я и правда образцовым лидером и самым настоящим комиссаром, то что с того? Мы не в Империуме, тут свои порядки".

traits.locale_text: {n}Мужчина с трудом сдерживается, чтобы не прыснуть со смеху.{/n} "Ой, прекрати! Конечно-конечно, раньше я был отбросом и пушечным мясом, но вот ТЕПЕРЬ я действительно нужен Империуму! Да даже будь я и правда образцовым лидером и самым настоящим комиссаром, то что с того? Мы не в Империуме, тут свои порядки".
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."
languages.original_text: {n}Мужчина с трудом сдерживается, чтобы не прыснуть со смеху.{/n} "Ой, прекрати! Мы не в Империуме, тут свои порядки".

languages.text: {n}他努力抑制着自己，让自己不要大笑起来。{/n}“唉哟，饶了我吧！看看你啊，伊科！帝国之前一直把你当成用完就扔的炮灰，可它现在又真的需要你了，可不是嘛！就算我真的是位领袖，真的是如假包换的政委，可谁又在乎呢？这里可不是帝国，这里的游戏有着不同的规则。”
languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

traits.locale_text: {n}他努力抑制着自己，让自己不要大笑起来。{/n}“唉哟，饶了我吧！看看你啊，伊科！帝国之前一直把你当成用完就扔的炮灰，可它现在又真的需要你了，可不是嘛！就算我真的是位领袖，真的是如假包换的政委，可谁又在乎呢？这里可不是帝国，这里的游戏有着不同的规则。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}彼はこらえきれず、大笑いしそうになっている。{/n}「勘弁してください！"いいじゃないか、イアコ！確かに帝国はお前をゴミのように扱ったかもしれないが、今度こそお前を必要としてるから安心しろ"ってしらじらしく言われても…仮に私が本当に優秀なリーダーで本物のコミッサーだったとしても、関係ありません。ここは帝国じゃない。ここは独自のルールで成りたっているのです」
languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はこらえきれず、大笑いしそうになっている。{/n}「勘弁してください！"いいじゃないか、イアコ！確かに帝国はお前をゴミのように扱ったかもしれないが、今度こそお前を必要としてるから安心しろ"ってしらじらしく言われても…仮に私が本当に優秀なリーダーで本物のコミッサーだったとしても、関係ありません。ここは帝国じゃない。ここは独自のルールで成りたっているのです」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Apenas consigue evitar echarse a reír.{/n} «¡Oh, por favor! "Venga, Iako, el Imperium te trató una vez como carne de cañón, pero AHORA te necesita de verdad, ¡lo prometo!". Aunque fuera un líder ejemplar y un Comisario de verdad, ¿a mí qué me importa? Esto no es el Imperium. Aquí es todo distinto».
languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

Aunque fuera un líder ejemplar y un Comisario de verdad, ¿a mí qué me importa? Esto no es el Imperium. Aquí es todo distinto».

languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

languages.text: {n}Il se retient de justesse d'éclater de rire.{/n} « Oh, arrêtez votre char ! "Je vous le dis, Iako ! Bon, d'accord, l'Imperium vous a traité comme de la chair à canon avariée, mais MAINTENANT, il a besoin de vous, je vous le promets !" Et puis même si j'étais un chef exemplaire et un vrai commissaire, qu'est-ce que ça changerait ? On n'est pas dans l'Imperium, ici. Les règles ne sont pas les mêmes. »
languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se retient de justesse d'éclater de rire.{/n} « Oh, arrêtez votre char ! "Je vous le dis, Iako ! Bon, d'accord, l'Imperium vous a traité comme de la chair à canon avariée, mais MAINTENANT, il a besoin de vous, je vous le promets !" Et puis même si j'étais un chef exemplaire et un vrai commissaire, qu'est-ce que ça changerait ? On n'est pas dans l'Imperium, ici. Les règles ne sont pas les mêmes. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Er kann nur mühsam verhindern, laut loszulachen.{/n} "Jetzt hört aber auf! 'Ich sage Euch, Iako! Sicher, das Imperium hat Euch bisher als Kanonenfutter benutzt, aber JETZT braucht es Euch wirklich, versprochen!' Selbst wenn ich ein vorbildlicher Anführer und echter Kommissar wäre, na und? Hier ist nicht das Imperium. Hier läuft ein anderes Spiel."
languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er kann nur mühsam verhindern, laut loszulachen.{/n} "Jetzt hört aber auf! 'Ich sage Euch, Iako! Sicher, das Imperium hat Euch bisher als Kanonenfutter benutzt, aber JETZT braucht es Euch wirklich, versprochen!' Selbst wenn ich ein vorbildlicher Anführer und echter Kommissar wäre, na und? Hier ist nicht das Imperium. Hier läuft ein anderes Spiel."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Kahkahalara boğulmamak için kendini zar zor tutuyor.{/n} "Of, laflara gel! 'Güven bana İako! Evet İmparatorluk zamanında seni ölüme göndermiş olabilir ama ŞİMDİ sana gerçekten ihtiyacı var! Hakikaten diyorum!' Örnek bir lider ve gerçek bir Komiser olsaydım bile kim takar? Burası İmparatorluk değil. Burada oyunun kuralları farklı."
languages.original_text: {n}He barely stops himself from bursting into laughter.{/n} "Oh, give me a break! 'I'm telling ya, Iako! Sure, the Imperium treated ya like dirty cannon fodder before, but NOW it really needs ya, I promise!' Even if I were an exemplary leader and a real Commissar, who cares? This isn't the Imperium. The game is different here."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kahkahalara boğulmamak için kendini zar zor tutuyor.{/n} "Of, laflara gel! 'Güven bana İako! Evet İmparatorluk zamanında seni çöp gibi ateşin içine atmış olabilir ama ŞİMDİ sana gerçekten ihtiyacı var! Hakikaten diyorum!' Örnek bir lider ve gerçek bir Komiser olsaydım bile kim takar? Burası İmparatorluk değil. Oyunun kuralları farklı burada."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
